name: FeatureCardTwentyThree
description: Feature section with separate media and card layout, featuring tags and arrow navigation.

description.example: Stay updated with the latest trends and insights

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

id.note: Unique identifier for the feature item

title.example: Discover the essential features of our app

tags.note: Array of tag strings displayed in Tag components

media.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc with optional imageAlt/videoAriaLabel

onFeatureClick.note: Optional click handler for the feature card

propsSchema.features: FeatureItem[] (required) - Array with id, title, tags[], imageSrc/videoSrc, onFeatureClick
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureCardTwentyThree
    title="Our Features"
    description="Stay updated with the latest trends and insights."
    tag="Features"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    textboxLayout="default"
    animationType="fade"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    features={[
      {
        id: "1",
        title: "Discover the essential features of our app",
        tags: ["Features", "New"],
        imageSrc: "/feature1.jpg"
      },
      {
        id: "2",
        title: "Advanced analytics for your business",
        tags: ["Analytics", "Pro"],
        imageSrc: "/feature2.jpg"
      }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Best for feature showcases with clean separation between imagery and content
dont: Do not use for text-heavy features
